document_data.caption: A map showing Tyraturos in Thay.
document_data.name: Tyraturos
document_data.mainbody: '''Tyraturos'''<ref group="note">The [[Old Empires (sourcebook)]] incorrectly labels this as "Tyraturas." was city located in the country of [[Thay]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The city in the central region of the [[tharch]] of [[Tyraturos (tharch)|Tyraturos]] north of [[Bezantur]].
document_data.History: Tyraturos was founded during an age of expansion of [[Mulhorand]] under the leadership of [[Anhurtep]]. The city was eventually claimed by Thay and was part of that country as of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
